typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{108583} as string,
		{Fawlty Towers} as string,
		Comedy as string,
		{1980} as string,
		{1} as string,
		{54} as string,
		U as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	preSQLs:['drop table junk']) ~> sink1
